release.action: Added possibility to enable specific URIs in IWSlideAuthenticator with a comma seperated application property.

Updated handling of authentication to let Slide be able to run on a separate server and authenticate correctly.
This was done for the golf application.

Made same change as in 3.1.7 regarding IWSlideAuthenticator and the Image and Link choosers (that also display the documents list) (/workspace/imagechooser and /workspace/linkchooser). This fixes the issue with the error displayed in the documents list by default after last update to the slide authentication mechanism.

Updated so that the IWSlideAuthenticator is enabled for the Documents list (/workspace/content/documents). This fixes the issue with the error displayed in the documents list by default after last update to the slide authentication mechanism.
Improved handing of Slide authentication, disabled Slide authentication by default for GET and POST requests.
+ IWSlideChangeEventClient was not initialized in IWSlideChangeTrigger

+ added IWSlideChangeEventClient that connects slide to the event system in core (the event system is used by com.idega.cluster) + attached IWSlideChangeEventClient to IWSlideChangeTrigger to be the event client
Updated dependencies to org.apache.slide 2.2.pre1.iwbuild5 and made small changes to extractors because of slide refactoring

Merging small change from HEAD, IWSlideService now supports inputstream uploading. Also added isFolder method that is currently not in head Updating org.apache.slide to v.2.2b8 Updating com.idega.core to v.3.1.8
Declaration of version for including in ePlatform release 3.1
Adding auto-detection of slide store implementation. Now automatically switches to the TxFileStore implementation on databases where Slide is not supported.
